DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect rifampin pharmacokinetics dapagliflozin
DOC.brief_title: Effect Rifampin Pharmacokinetics Dapagliflozin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 32 inclusive Women childbearing potential men , age 18 45 Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical laboratory determination Glucosuria Abnormal liver function test
